original_text: For my part, even though I am not physically present, I am with you in spirit. As one who is present with you in this way, I have already passed judgment in the name of our Lord Jesus on the one who has been doing this.
korean_text: 내가 실로 몸으로는 떠나 있으나 영으로는 함께 있어서 거기 있는 것 같이 이런 일 행한 자를 이미 판단하였노라

sentences.original_text: For my part, even though I am not physically present
sentences.korean_translation: 나의 입장에서는, 비록 내가 육체적으로는 함께하지 않지만

sentences.original_text: I am with you in spirit
As one who is present with you in this way
sentences.korean_translation: 이런 방식으로 너희와 함께 있는 자로서

sentences.original_text: in the name of our Lord Jesus
on the one who has been doing this
